diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Infective endocarditis due to Streptococcus pneumoniae with pneumonia and endogenous endophthalmitis
diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Bacterial superinfection of a viral respiratory process, pneumococcal pneumonia, pneumococcal endocarditis, endogenous endophthalmitis
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient exhibited multilobar pneumonia with clinical evidence of bacteremia likely leading to infective endocarditis characterized by aortic valve disease. The culture yielded a strain of Streptococcus pneumoniae sensitive to antibiotics, further supporting the diagnosis.
